title: ADMISSION TO KINDERGARTEN AND GRADE 1 FOR AY 2023-24
text: Please note the dates for distribution of Prospectus and Application for Admission to Kindergarten and Grade 1 of The Asian School.
Issue of Prospectus with Application for Admission to siblings of our students only: 24ᵗʰ and 25ᵗʰ January, 2023.
Issue of Prospectus with Application for Admission to others: 7ᵗʰ and 8ᵗʰ February, 2023
Prospectus can be procured from the school office between 8:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. on the allotted dates only
